message: ...This is bliss. For this one moment, we are truly together.
When I return to reality, Ren will still be with me as an Allmate. Nothing will change.
Only...
...I'll never get to hold him in my arms like this again.

Ren takes human form in Rhyme, but that's ultimately just a game.

This joining was only possible because of Scrap, and I know that I'll never be able to use it on myself again.
That it worked even once was nothing short of a miracle. And that miracle only happened because... I didn't want to let Ren go.
I'm glad that we had this chance to be together, to feel our love for each other skin-to-skin.

name: 蓮
message: "...Aoba."

name: 蓮
message: "I have... concerns."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?"

name: 蓮
message: "You have a bad habit of thinking beyond your capacity to process."

name: 蓮
message: "And when you get worked up, you tend to lose control of your emotions."

name: 蓮
message: "And you have a hard time saying no to people sometimes."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Haha!"

name: 蓮
message: "...What? Did I say something funny?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "No, sorry. I was just wondering what brought this on."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Plus, it reminded me of how well you know me. I guess I shouldn't be surprised, though."

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I mean, you've been with me since before I can even remember. So you know me better than anyone."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Better than I know myself, even."
Ren nuzzles into my shoulder without another word. I wrap my arms around him and stroke his head, enjoying the time we have left.
...An ache forms in my chest.
Why do I feel so sad?
Even after we go back, we'll still be together. We share a bond unlike any other.
We're inseparable. Meant for each other.
But despite all that...

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...It sucks."
I struggle to get the words out through my tears.
I close my eyes and let out a long sigh, but can't keep them from spilling down my face.
Ren rubs his nose against the nape of my neck.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm sorry. Just... give me a second..."

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I know I'm asking for too much... I'm happy to just be with you... I'm sorry."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I mean, if it sucks for me, it must suck for you too..."

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I... I love you, Ren."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I always will."
I'm sure these are tears I need to shed in order to move forward.
That must be why I'm crying...
Ren clasps my cheeks in his hands and gently touches his forehead to mine.
Just like I always do with him...
His warmth brings with it a fresh wave of tears.

name: 蓮
message: "We'll be together forever."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Yeah."

name: 蓮
message: "I'll always be there, Aoba. I'll always be with you."

name: 蓮
message: "So don't cry."
I kiss him softly.
He licks my lips and laps the tears off my cheeks.
Until the very last moment comes, I won't let him go.
